title: "Typografi Og Skrift" serif text face and grotesque
author: inajohansen

comments.content: The text face looks like Adobe Minion.
Headline (TYPOGRAFI OG SKRIFT) looks a bit like Impact, but the G is different (no spur).
the g is also different in adobe minion.... ahhh i hate it when what the font is down.. :(

Looks a bit like Volvo Broad or Berthold Block Extra Condensed. Found this picture in another discussion.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120213232347im_/http:/typophile.com/files/3063_3593.gif)
